definition: the faculty through which the external world is apprehended
details:
noun
- the faculty through which the external world is apprehended
= synonyms: sentience
- an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation
= example: an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation
= synonyms: esthesis, aesthesis, sense experience, sense impression, sense datum
- a general feeling of excitement and heightened interest
= example: a general feeling of excitement and heightened interest
- someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= synonyms: champion
- a state of widespread public excitement and interest
= example: a state of widespread public excitement and interest
